column1:
Options +FollowSymLinks -MultiViews
	# Turn mod_rewrite on
	RewriteEngine On
	RewriteBase /
	RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f
	RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-d
	RewriteRule ^(.*)$ index.php?$1 [L,QSA]
	RewriteCond %{THE_REQUEST} ^[A-Z]{3,}\s(.*)/index\.php [NC]
	RewriteRule ^ %1 [R=301,L]
